As a growing IT consulting and contract staffing firm servicing the greater Boston area, we are seeking a highly motivated Junior Recruiter to join our team. Reporting to the Director of Recruiting, primary responsibilities will include contacting, screening and assisting in the placement of qualified candidates at our client sites. The ideal candidate would possess inside sales experience, dynamic personality and the ability to build relationships with good communication skills. The Junior Recruiter will be groomed to assist in development and implementation of our recruiting strategies and processes, while working closely with our management team. If you are someone who works hard, exceptionally dedicated, upbeat and enjoys helping and working with great people, TreeTop Technologies is the company for you! 

With more than a decade of proven excellence in IT staffing and consulting, we maintain very close relationships with our clients and consultants, which sets us apart from the competition. We are known by our clients and consultants for our creative and entrepreneurial style that builds strong team relationships in a professional and collaborative environment. In addition to a competitive compensation package (base salary + uncapped commissions + benefits), we offer a positive work environment, excellent reputation and a great support team..

Over fifteen years of full life-cycle recruiting in both corporate and agency environments. I thrive in finding top passive talent in all areas. I am committed to diversity, equity, and inclusion in all my recruiting strategies and policies. I believe companies are impacted in "uncountable ways" when people with a wide range of backgrounds, experiences, and identities come together with common purposes and goals.

Finding "superstar"​ technology talent is my passion. My network includes 5000+ 1st degree LinkedIn connections in the Digital, eCommerce and Adtech space. 

On-site I have worked at DoubleClick, Google, Datran Media, Proclivity Systems, MediaBrix (Receptiv), OkCupid, Lifebooker, Magnetic, Vroom, adMarketplace and Raptive (CafeMedia).

recruiter_about:
👏 Greetings, fellow LinkedIn adventurers! 

Prepare to be amused, inspired, and mildly bewildered as you delve into the whimsical world of my professional journey. 

I present to you a summary that combines my diverse experiences as “The Recruiting Guy,” a Disabled Army Airborne Veteran, a Fortune 100 alumni, a Serial Entrepreneur, a devoted Father and Husband who recently endured the heart-wrenching loss of a child, an enthusiastic Community Volunteer, and a Talent Acquisition Specialist extraordinaire whom derives from a Remote Fishing Village in ALASKA! 🎣

Imagine a recruiting maverick with a parachute cord in one hand and an offer letter in the other, ready to JUMP into the deep waters of talent acquisition. As The Recruiting Guy, I've mastered the art of reeling in the most exceptional candidates and bringing teams together like no other. I'm the go-to expert when it comes to casting nets in the vast sea of talent, ensuring the perfect match. From polishing resumes to acing interviews, I navigate the recruitment jungle while wearing a jump boots and a wetsuit—talk about multitasking! 🙃

Oh, did I mention my Fortune 100 background? Yes, I've climbed the corporate ladder, maneuvering the skyscraping heights of success and occasional loop-de-loops of challenges. I understand the needs of clients and tirelessly find the perfect fit. For job seekers, I'm your guiding compass, helping you stand out in a competitive market. From resume revamps to interview coaching, I make the job search an exciting adventure with guaranteed results.

As a Serial Entrepreneur, I've dived into the thrilling world of business ventures, launching ideas into the stratosphere and turning dreams into reality. This entrepreneurial spirit allows me to bring a fresh perspective to the table, thinking outside the box and finding innovative solutions to recruitment challenges. 

But wait, there's more! As a Doctoral Candidate, I've embraced the pursuit of knowledge with unabashed curiosity. I've dived into the intellectual ocean, conducting research that pushes boundaries and challenges conventional wisdom on what I have term, “The World of Work.” Armed with my curiosity of life and a library card, I'm on a quest to make the world a more enlightened place, one thesis at a time.

With a unique blend of expertise, I've climbed the corporate ladder, launched successful ventures, and faced life's challenges with strength and compassion. 

🔌 Connect with me, and let's embark on an adventure that will revolutionize your recruitment experience or catapult your career to new heights.

Hi there! I'm Tallin, and I am all about the people (and the technology) moving the world forward. I am a Technical Recruiter at Amazon Lab126, the inventive research and development company that designs and engineers high-profile devices like the Kindle, Echo, and Fire TV. Machine learning, computer vision, and the Internet of Things are all making a huge impact on how we live and work today. Excited to be part of the community making these ideas a reality! 

I have 6+ years of experience recruiting, sourcing, and hiring exceptional technical talent in North America, including Canada, USA, and Mexico. My mission is to connect with passionate and innovative professionals who share Amazon's vision of creating devices that will impact millions of customers.

If you are interested in joining the Amazon Devices team in Mexico, or exploring other exciting opportunities at Amazon Lab126 or Project Kuiper, please feel free to reach out to me on LinkedIn or email me at tmuskat@amazon.com.

Check out some of our open roles in Mexico here: https://amazon.jobs/content/en/teams/devices-services/devices-mexico

Outside of work, I love spending time with my family, reading, hiking, traveling, catching up with old friends, and practicing Hindi - my husband is from India, so I have a good tutor :) I believe in human potential and each person becoming the best version of themselves. Let’s go out and get 1% better every day! Look forward to learning, growing, and connecting.

recruiter_about:
Those that know me will tell you I am a fun loving and easygoing guy, but I have a tenacious desire for success! I absolutely do not understand the meaning of the word quite, because if I have set my mind to do something you can count on it to get done one way or another. That does not mean that I have not seen my fair share of failures though, because without failure we cannot appreciate success.

Just out of High School, I served in the U.S. Navy for 20 years (1993- 2013) where I had many different job titles in many different types of environments and places. Starting as the new man on the team I did whatever task was required to keep things running and worked my way up to senior leadership positions where I learned the true value of teamwork and collaboration and how to manage a successful team. Finally, as a Navy Recruiter, I was able to “Pay-It-Forward” the chance that was once given to me so many years ago that certainly changed my life. As a teenager I had big dreams but didn’t necessarily have a direction to go in. Then a Navy Recruiter helped me find a path to both of these things, so at the end of my career I felt it was my turn to help those in need.

Today I am an Entrepreneur, Internet Marketer, and Professional Sales Consultant enjoying time with my family. I love creating engaging content that draws in a viewer and encourages them to interact with my brand(s), either starting a new relationship or continuing to fan the flames of an existing one. To me, marketing is about more than just having a customer look at you, it is about finding them and engaging with them on a personal level inside their comfort zone.

recruiter_about:
"We looked at 500+ resumes for 3 months and got nowhere. Then we partnered with No B.S. Devs. 
In just 5 days, they blew us away! They gave us 7 great candidates, and we hired 4!"


Tech recruiting Done for you by software devs.


"In only 12 days, No B.S. Devs found 9 good candidates. We hired 5, and they're great! No B.S. Devs did in two weeks what others couldn't do in months. We saved time and money!"


Most companies we work with face these challenges:

1. Time Waste: It takes too long to find good devs. 82% of Hiring Managers admit that it takes at least 3 months to find a developer.

2. Bad Hires Cost a Lot: Hiring the wrong developer can cost 200-400% of their yearly pay.

3. Empty Jobs Hurt: 42% of engineering team leaders say they had to stop or slow down projects because they didn't have enough people.

4. Wasted Work: Engineering teams spend too much time talking to people who can't do the job. For every 10 people they interview, 7 are not even qualified enough.


Three critical pain points we address:

1. Resume Overload: Drowning in reviewing, sourcing, and screening thousands of resumes filled with technical jargon, making it challenging to identify truly qualified candidates.

2. Candidate Quality: Constantly dealing with dishonest candidates who misrepresent their skills on resumes and in pre-screening calls, leading to unqualified candidates slipping through the process.

3. Resource Drain: Software devs in your company spend an average of 25 hours per hire on technical interviews, taking valuable time away from product development and causing project delays.


As ex-software developers, we know exactly what a developer is expected to do (and demand). 
So we always make sure to bring you the best-possible candidates.


Interested in working together?

You can book a short, 15-minute call with me where we'll:

1. Identify your current hiring struggles
2. Identify the unique needs for your team
3. Walk you through the No B.S. Devs process

Book here: https://calendly.com/no-bs-devs/client-intro

If we're the right fit, we'll send over our best offer to you, so that we can send over the best candidates to you, as well - as soon as possible!

Looking forward to speaking!

Tommy
Co-Founder, No B.S. Devs

recruiter_about:
Lead Recruiter at Vizit | Boston, MA

At Vizit, the global leader in Predictive Image Analytics, I spearhead talent acquisition efforts to drive our AI-powered Visual Brand Performance Platform forward, helping brands optimize image effectiveness at every step of the consumer journey.

🌟 Full-Cycle Recruitment Excellence: I have a strong record of recruiting top talent across engineering, operations, marketing, sales, and product management, maintaining a 2-week average time to fill during high-growth phases and achieving an 85% offer acceptance rate—exceeding industry standards.

🌟 Leadership & Training: Skilled in leading high-performing teams, I provide multidisciplinary training that drives tangible organizational growth.

🌟 Strategic Talent Acquisition: With a deep understanding of the tech landscape, I excel at identifying and filling hard-to-fill roles, contributing directly to company growth through market-savvy recruitment strategies.

🌟 Impact at Ocient: Successfully recruited 84 full-time employees and 30 interns within nine months, supporting the company’s rapid expansion.

In addition to my recruiting expertise, I’m a serial tech entrepreneur with experience in launching 8 startups, developing 4 applications, and selling 2 companies. My digital marketing background spans over a decade, with 8 HubSpot Academy Marketing & Sales certifications, 2 Klaviyo Academy certifications, and the HootSuite Social Marketing certification.

I’ve been deeply involved in the tech community as a former AngelHack Boston organizer, TechStars Startup Weekend Boston advisor, and co-founder of Precision Pitch Practice with Boston New Technology. I also served as a Solution Evangelist for Microsoft’s BizSpark startup incubator and ran the Boston JavaScript meetup for several years.

🌟RedRover: Talent Sharing (CoAccelerator Alum, 2015 Startup Weekend Spokane Crowd Favorite)

🌟FounderMatchup: Acquired by CoFoundersLab (2012)

🌟ReferralBonus: SXSW Accelerator Finalist (2012, MassChallenge Semi-finalist)

🌟FriendFlirt: MassChallenge Semi-finalist (2013)

🌟Game Set Match: Currently dormant

recruiter_about:
I'm motivated by helping people change their lives for the better. I have a knack for trusting my intuition and taking leaps of faith as well as being pleasantly persistent. :) 

For Ex: Who else leaves a decade long successful career in Advertising to shift into Recruitment or gets laid off and buys a one way ticket to Sydney, Australia with only a Visa in hand and finds a dream job. It was all scary but with a risk, it yields a award - whether it's a great story or a learning lesson. :)

Currently, I'm a recruiter hiring Go to Market - Enterprise level Solution Engineers and Solution Architects (Pre and Post Sales) at Twilio. It's been a dream to work with such talent here at Twilio and have such amazing conversations with candidates. 

Previously, I hired online Educators (Teachers, Principles, Nurses etc) you would find at a brick and mortar school for K12.com. It was incredibly rewarding to have the impact knowing that I'm hiring well qualified educators to help shape the future. 

I started my recruitment career as Tech Recruiter at Computer Futures where I was for almost two years until Covid came crashing the world to a halt. I learned the ups and downs of contract recruitment and was constantly fueled by knowing I can make a difference in someone's life by finding them their dream job. I learned a lot about the USCIS guidelines and felt passionate about ensuring that the most qualified candidates gets the job regardless of Visa status such as H1B/OPT/CPT. 

I started my advertising career in 2007 by working at Universal McCann and Initiative Media in Media Planning for companies such as Sony and Hyundai for 3 years and then realized I was a "people person" and switched to Advertising Sales. For 8 years I sold, planned and strategized media campaigns for Fortune 500 companies in Los Angeles, CA, Sydney, Australia and Austin, TX. 

In my last job in advertising, I was a Sr. AM at Ad Action, a mobile ad tech start up, where I managed 15 to 30 campaigns with a strategic and analytical mindset to ensure our customers not only had traffic but quality users. Basically, I was a glorified digital campaign analyst where I made sure to optimize mobile streams of traffic to profitability based off CPA (cost per action). 

Recruiting Skill-sets: 

Recruiting Tools: Boolean, LinkedIn, LinkedIn Recruiter, Indeed, CareerBuilder, Zip Recruiter, Dice, and repository sites like GitHub. I loved other creative ways such as using Facebook, Meet Up events, or even Blind to find candidates.

recruiter_about:
"The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who usually do." - Steve Jobs. 

As a child my first dream was to be an adventurer who traveled the world meeting new people—I was obviously not accounting for the cost of living. Two years past, I realized that I needed to find a more viable career, so I had the bright idea of becoming an artist! At the time, I thought I had it all figured out. I was the top artist in the entire second grade, I could definitely live a happy life and make a living off of my art. Nevertheless, my full proof plan fell through, I had yet again changed my course and have continued changing courses ever since.
 
Today, after a couple of detours, I find myself at Tesla searching for the world's best talent. In my everyday life I am a go-getter, life enthusiast, foodie, student of culture, gamer, proud dog petter, and friend to those in need—including animals. My professional experiences have made me well versed in communicating with diverse groups of people and leadership, while my coursework has allowed me to hone my technical skills in applications such as Microsoft office and Tableau. On a personal level, I'd say resilience is my speciality. 

My goals are to lead a fulfilling life by following my passions and to leave a positive mark in this interconnected world. Therefore, I am constantly working hard to look for new experiences to help me find out how I will apply my passion to change the world in my own way.

Throughout 9+ years of my career in information management, technical training, and project coordination, I have provided impactful humanitarian services integrating food security, environmental sustainability, and emerging technologies. My key contributions include scaling a Blockchain based project, which used blockchain to provide food and WASH assistance to over 880,000 Rohingya refugees. I have coordinated technical efforts between teams and trained staff on complaint and feedback systems. Also led data analysis for Food Security Sector mappings and managed emergency food logistics for 10,000+ households during crisis response. I have served as the principal supervisor for a Land Stabilization project with FAO and BRAC, planting 100,000 saplings in refugee camps to promote environmental sustainability and cash-based aid. My strong partnership skills, field coordination, and advocacy have fostered sustainable solutions in refugee support, food security, and environmental projects.

I thoroughly enjoy loving on others and lending a helping hand to those in need, both professionally and personally.

My passion in life is enabling others to reach their full potential! It's not about what you know, it's about who you know!

Hi! 
I'm an HR manager, at Octopus Lab.
I am inspired by the opportunity to create a positive work environment where employees can reach their potential and achieve personal and professional growth.
Likewise, I perform search and recruitment duties for highly qualified candidates in the IT field. My experience includes working with a wide range of technologies and programming languages.

recruiter_about:
Are you a Construction, Development or Design leader who’s not sure how to hire your next ideal candidate?

Looking for a better way to recruit top talent who have relevant project experience and align with your company’s cultural DNA?

Tired of receiving irrelevant resumes from job boards?

(keep reading)

I’ve been in your position myself, a couple times. 

First, when I left my dad’s construction team (then hired them 3 top performers, who are still excelling 2+ years later).

Second, when I launched my own headhunting practice thinking all I had to do was “work my network” and the top talent would fall in my lap.

(long story short, the network dried up fast and I had to invest around $100K in world class talent acquisition mentorship -- my biz partner was thrilled about that). 

Good news is a few years later we are now a headhunting partner for some of America's most reputable construction teams, from Top 100 ENR firms — to teams under 100. 

The point? Trust me when I tell you there’s a better way. 

If you are a construction or AEC leader, and you are… 

❌ Tired of hiring multiple “contingency recruiters” who send resumes that check 2/10 of your boxes, then ghost you…

❌ Sick of "begging" for referrals and introductions from team members…

❌ Looking for a more predictable way than job boards or under-performing recruiters to headhunt top talent from your competition (and stop losing talent to competitors who are not as good as you)…

I’ve got something that’ll put an end to your misery, once and for all. 

It’s called our “Big League Talent System”

When you harness our “Big League Talent System” for your business, you will:

✅ Never worry where your next top candidate is coming from because you have a pipeline full of top talent excited to work with you

✅ Have ONE recruiter who represents your value prop at an elite level in the market, speaking to all your competitors talent within days or weeks, 𝗡𝗢𝗧 months or even years (so when it comes to you vs the competition, talent feels way more comfortable with you)

✅ Hire the “ideal talent” you’ve only ever dreamed of (I’m talking about proven talent straight from your competitors…)

In case you think I’m full of it, here’s what a few clients have to say plus more info on our unique value prop: https://bigleaguetalent.brizy.site/

P.S. If you're curious to learn more, book a complimentary “strategy call” and we’ll get crystal clear on how you can recruit market-defining talent without relying on job boards or hiring multiple contingency recruiters: calendly.com/big-league-talent/discovery-call

recruiter_about:
With over twenty years of experience in full life-cycle Technical Recruiting, I have successfully supported staffing projects for renowned companies such as Apple and Samsung. In 2018, I transitioned from the agency world to corporate recruiting, specializing in Robotics, Software, Hardware, and Electrical Engineering roles for a cutting-edge MedTech Robotics System Start Up.

Working closely with my Recruiting Director, we achieved substantial growth, doubling the company's size from 250 to over 500 employees, with minimal reliance on external agencies. In 2020, Johnson & Johnson acquired my company, and I transitioned to the Data Science Recruiting team as the sole Sourcer. Building strong relationships with business stakeholders, I attracted top Data Science talent to the company. As a result, I was subsequently promoted to a Talent Acquisition Partner role, continuing to collaborate with key business leaders.

Currently, as a member of the Data Science Talent team, I partner with Commercial Leaders in recruiting for various AI & Data Science Product strategy and development roles. Additionally, I work closely with the AI & Data Science teams contributing to the growth and success of our MedTech products.

Specialties:
- Proficient in targeted sourcing techniques, including Boolean Search Strings, X-Ray Searches, GIT, and Social Media Sourcing.
- Utilize sourcing tools such as Seekout and LinkedIn Recruiter, as well as HRIS systems like Taleo, Newton, Workday, and Hiredscore.
- Extensive experience in Recruiting & Networking, with a proven track record in negotiation and relationship building.
- National and international recruiting experience, with particular expertise in Data Science & Robotics roles within the Commercial Pharmaceutical and MedTech R&D sectors.

With my diverse skill set and in-depth understanding of the industry, I am committed to identifying top talent and strategically driving the growth of organizations in the rapidly evolving technology landscape.

We’re looking for Data Scientists to work on our core and business products (ex. Instagram, Messaging, Growth, Engagement, Ads) to help shape the future of what we build at Facebook. You will enjoy working with one of the richest data sets in the world, cutting edge technology, and the ability to see your insights turned into real products on a regular basis. The perfect candidate will have a background in a quantitative or technical field, will have experience working with large data sets, and will have some experience in data-driven decision making. You are focused on results, a self-starter, and have demonstrated success in using analytics to drive the understanding, growth, and success of a product.

If you are interested, please email me your resume sambalaton@fb.com.

About me: 
I enjoy recruiting because I get to meet people from all walks of life and really identify what they are passionate about. I get to know people on a personal level since we are so much more than simply what we do for work. The best feeling is helping someone find their dream job and being his or her resource during the interview process. 

I attended the University of Illinois at Chicago and obtained my bachelors in Applied Psychology in December of 2012. I recently completed a Masters of Industrial/Organizational Psychology (which is a fancy way of saying Business Psychology) at The Chicago School of Professional Psychology and got PHR certified in 2014.

recruiter_about:
"The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do" 
- Steve Jobs

"A recruiter is a company's most important position after the CEO. What could possibly be more important than who gets hired?" 
- Jack Welch 

Passionate Technical Recruiter specializing in Ai/ML for Alexa Ai which is responsible for speech and acoustic event technology for Alexa. Our mission is to enable Alexa to understand and respond to customers in an ultra-natural way, on any endpoint, in any language, under any noise conditions. Some of the systems we work on include those that wake Alexa when customers desire, convert speech to text, identify speakers by voice, detect sounds and vocalizations beyond speech, create the voice of Alexa, and enable local processing on Alexa devices for speed and offline functionality.

We also help device developers by providing the wakeword engine they use to determine when their Alexa-enabled should "wake up" and listen to a customer's request, and modules that enable Alexa-enabled devices to execute a subset of Alexa requests without connecting to cloud services. And for skill developers, we provide our hypothesis for what non-speech vocalizations a customer is expressing (such as emotions), and our hypothesis for when Alexa hears certain non-speech audio (such as smoke alarms).
Additionally, we provide a set of services that are core to every Alexa interaction, including the ability to detect what words a customer says when they speak to Alexa, and what speech audio we should play back to an Alexa user as part of Alexa's response to them. 

Interested in creating the future? We are looking for Software Development Engineers and Managers, Technical Program and Technical Product Managers, Applied Scientists, and Technical Leaders to join our team. We are hiring in Seattle, Sunnyvale, Boston, and Toronto. Email me directly at marenikk@amazon.com for more info!

recruiter_about:
Hello! I’m Rafael, a Cybersecurity Analyst for FourCorners Cyber and a Recruiter for our partner company Symmetrio. I am passionate about cybersecurity, as it allows me to contribute to the effort of creating a more secure online environment for everyone. Additionally, my role as a recruiter lets me extend this enthusiasm by identifying exceptional individuals who share the same dedication as me. Outside of my professional pursuits, I enjoy traveling, exploring nature, playing tennis, and soccer.

In these roles, I work closely with CISOs, Analysts, and Engineers from diverse companies in both the private and public sectors. My responsibilities include overseeing cybersecurity assessments, creating reports tailored for both technical and non-technical audiences, and identifying exceptional talent to meet our clients' needs.

Through my work, my goal is to help companies succeed by spotting risks, designing solutions to reduce those risks and building strong teams to keep their digital information safe. My commitment is to make a lasting impact on the cybersecurity landscape, by fostering a safer and more resilient online world for everybody.

recruiter_about:
AtlasAdvancement is an Executive Search firm located in Tysons Corner, VA. We pride ourselves on introducing top-level clients with top-level talent. AtlasAdvancement is here to guide you through the process of testing the job market and finding your ideal next opportunity. 
 
What Makes Us Better: AtlasAdvancement works with passive job seekers; people who are already employed and happy in their current position. These people are the pick of the employment market and can often be persuaded to make a move for a dream-job scenario. More than 90% of our candidates fall into this category, and whether it is 6 months or 2 years from the date we first meet a candidate, when we get a job that matches their wants and needs, we tell them about it. After matching, the process for both client and candidate is quick and easy.

I am an open networker - Send me an invitation to connect: calvin@iplaceusa.com All invitations to connect are welcomed! LION – LinkedIn Open Networker.

iPlace USA is a global recruiting company with headquarters in McLean, Virginia and an international recruiting center in Pune, India. We provide professionally managed sourcing and recruiting services for American companies from our facility in Pune. iPlace’s domain expertise includes IT, engineering, finance and accounting, healthcare, and sales.

Because our sourcers and recruiters work from India, partnering with iPlace is less than half the cost of working with US-based contract sourcers and recruiters. However, our clients partner with iPlace because our quality is excellent.

Sometimes when people hear that our sourcers and recruiters work from India there is confusion about what iPlace does. In a nutshell, we help US companies fill job openings in the US. iPlace has nothing to do with bringing over people from India to work in the US. Just like US recruiters, iPlace finds people already in America for jobs in America.

I am currently working on technical and non-technical job orders for the Telecom, Healthcare and IT industries. I am a strong communicator with proven abilities in client and candidate relationship management.

I am a graduate of iPlace Academy, a seven week intensive training program considered the best sourcing and recruiting training program in India.

recruiter_about:
I'm Leah Dillon, a California-based recruiter and content creator. With a background encompassing tech corporations and startups, I discuss the nuances of recruitment processes, shedding light on topics like applicant tracking systems (ATS), interview preparation, and resume optimization.
I am dedicated to dispelling prevalent recruitment myths while offering practical insights from someone currently working in talent acquisition. My ultimate mission is to empower job seekers with transparent advice for enhancing their self-presentation. On the corporate side, I collaborate with companies to refine their hiring strategies, ensuring they not only acquire top talent but also foster their teams' growth. 

Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) I have hands-on knowledge and personally used: Greenhouse, Lever, Amazon Hire, Workable, Ashby, iCIMS, Workday, Taleo.

All opinions and statements are my own, they do not reflect the ideas or opinions of current or past employers.

---
Please no agency inquiries. 

Disclaimer: I do not respond to MLM messages (Primerica, Transamerica, Pinnacle Elite, etc), Bench Sales Recruiters, Business Development Managers for placement services, or inappropriate, sexualized messages. 

I do not hire C2C/C2H roles or hire outside the US. I do not presently have new grad or internship openings. If you are inquiring for roles, please note I may prioritize responding to inquiries for roles I do hire for.

Up-to-date list of all open positions at my company will always be found at gc.com/careers I encourage you to review the current openings and apply directly if you feel you're a strong fit. If you do not currently see an opening that aligns with your experience, it's possible we're not presently hiring for that role.

recruiter_about:
I have over 20 years of experience recruiting technology and a vast network of leadership talent. Over the years assisted growing healthtech/digital health/data related companies hire technology leaders with a special focus on product building, infrastructure, and software engineering. 

BIG OR STARTUP - we can make it work!

🏥With industry expertise and an eye for the skills and qualities that make candidates stand out, I bridge the gap between visionary companies and exceptional professionals.

🔎It can be difficult dealing with the complexities of integrating cutting-edge technology into your healthcare or healthtech organization. Faced with data silos, legacy systems, and the relentless pressure of maintaining data privacy, the challenges can seem insurmountable. The need to navigate stringent regulations, ensure impeccable data governance, and attract top-tier talent in a fiercely competitive market is not easy.

⚠️In an industry where innovation can literally save lives, your organization can't afford to fall behind due to technical or talent shortages.

🎯 My goal is to help you match proven leaders of all levels who share your company vision and can help further develop or maintain your product, service, or infrastructure. 

RECRUITING AREAS:
=============
Hiring: #NLP #LLM #Bigdata #Data #Cloud #Datascience #artificialintelligence #DataAnalysts #dataengineer #softwareengineer #machinelearning #AWS #python #enterprisearchitecture #EHR #claims #java #javascript and others

Here's how I make a difference:
====================
✅ By providing talent that matches your precise needs, eliminating the hassle of sifting through unqualified candidates that don't align what your strategy.
✅ By understanding the unique challenges and regulations of the healthcare sector, ensuring candidates who are not just skilled but also industry-ready.
✅ By offering guidance and support throughout the recruitment process, making sure your new hires are aligned with your organizational goals and culture.

➡️Ready to transform your talent strategy and drive your healthcare technology initiatives forward? 
💻Connect with me at robin@executivelevels.com. 

📞Let’s discuss how we can bring your projects to life with the talent that makes a difference.

recruiter_about:
Hey potential candidates! *PLEASE READ* 

I get hundreds of messages a day so I don’t have time to respond to all of them with general inquiries.

I support Amazon’s Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) organization for hiring the following positions: Applied Scientist, Sr. Applied Scientist, & Applied Science managers.

Basic Qualifications:

Applied Scientist: PHD w/ 0-3 years of hands on experience. H-index of 5+

Sr. Applied Scientist: PHD w/ 4-8 years of hands on experience. H-index of 15+

Applied Science Manager: Same as Sr. Applied Scientist + managing a team of 6+ direct reports. (Being a lead without actual direct reports will not suffice)

Skill sets I’m looking for: 

Natural Language Processing (NLP)
Large Language Models (LLM)
Generative AI (GenAI) image & video
Computer Vision Machine Learning (CVML)
Multi modal
Deep Learning & neural networks
Information Retrieval
Recommender systems
Reinforcement learning through human feedback (RLHF)
Diffusion models
Causal inference
Embodied AI
Responsible AI (RAI)

All of this positions are hybrid! There are no remote options.

AGI locations: Seattle, Bellevue, Los Angeles, Sunnyvale, Manhattan beach, Santa Barbara, San Jose, & Boston.

*these locations are team specific so please look at the job posting for applicable locations

I do not have insight for any other job families such as Software engineers or program management. 

Please search for available positions on Amazon jobs and the correct recruiter for that position will reach out if interested.

recruiter_about:
Many IT organizations today seek both the flexibility to obtain resources when and where needed and the ability to “gear up” for projects that require specialized application skills that don’t exist or can’t be leveraged internally. 
Staff augmentation can help you achieve a number of business goals including faster speed-to-market, industry and technical experience that accelerates the quality and speed of development, and avoiding the cost and time required for internal training and skill development.
FOCUS Staff Augmentation services provide skilled personnel to work under your direction to help you develop, maintain, manage and support your IT. Our skilled IT professionals can help you manage fluctuating skill needs, skills gaps and changing staffing needs to meet your aggressive project timelines. FOCUS resources work with you on-site or remote, and are certified in key technologies from FOCUS’'s multiple global delivery centers Nationwide.

 Schedule Interviews
 Drug testing
 Background Checks
 Credit Checks

 Additional outsourcing service

recruiter_about:
Brett has been with Amazon Talent Acquisition (TA) for over two years, starting as a Recruiter I (L4) supporting Alexa and Software Test Teams (QAEs/SDETs). Before Amazon, he was a top-performing agency recruiter, managing full-life cycle recruiting for roles ranging from high volume positions to cybersecurity, software engineers, and director and C-suite roles.

Brett has demonstrated a deep understanding of Amazon's processes by improving sourcing and process efficiency. Despite being a “sourcing recruiter,” he has embraced full life cycle responsibilities, creating offers and taking ownership of negotiation, presentation, offer extension, and onboarding processes, optimizing team efficacy and hiring speed.

Brett’s expertise in operational excellence and project management allows him to develop and execute sourcing strategies independently. He played a crucial role in planning and executing the AGI pilot program’s TA deliverables as well as completing a Master’s Degree in Project Management with a specialization in Strategic Innovation and Change Management, maintaining a 4.0 GPA.

Brett’s work is strategic, managing high volume and hard-to-fill roles for various Amazon teams, including AGI, Consumer Robotics, eero, DOSTA, Amazon Games (Luna), and Amazon Appstore. He partners with hiring managers to understand the candidate market, educate them on best hiring practices, and create lasting relationships. He identifies and mitigates risks early on and brings quality, speed, and quantity to ensure the best candidates are hired.

Brett is dedicated to mentoring and supporting his peers, leading recruitment educational sessions, and volunteering to help whenever needed. He has become an SME in the software quality space, handling roles from L2 to L6 for Software Test Team roles, Quality Assurance Engineers, and Software Development Engineers in Test. His customer obsession, ability to earn trust, and deliver results make him highly sought after by hiring managers.

Brett excels in candidate generation. Brett’s meticulous attention to detail, effective use of LinkedIn, and positive candidate experiences have made him an invaluable asset to Amazon.

Brett significantly influenced international teams, including India TA, Quality Services Test teams in India, and TA teams in Costa Rica and EMEA. He led India’s 2&5 Promise project, helping Team Krithi exceed their goal, and championed the International Cultural Committee, fostering unity across global teams.

✅ Exclusive access to a database of 1,000’s of cyber security sales, pre-sales and professional service professionals built and nurtured over 10 years, many of whom are not on job boards

✅ Experience in recruiting over 500 permanent placements
✅ We submit a candidate shortlist within 2 weeks of being instructed
✅ WE ARE SO CONFIDENT OF OUR ABILITY TO DELIVER QUALITY CANDIDATES WE OFFER A 3 MONTH GUARANTEE ON ALL PLACEMENTS

recruiter_about:
We recognize that hiring is hard. And hiring well is even harder.

But, that’s exactly what we help companies do: 𝗛𝗶𝗿𝗲𝘄𝗲𝗹𝗹.

Since 2001, we've been a staple in the Chicago business community, helping our clients large and small, grow their organizations by recruiting the top-tier talent they need.

𝗜𝗻𝗻𝗼𝘃𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗶𝘀 𝗶𝗻 𝗢𝘂𝗿 𝗕𝗹𝗼𝗼𝗱.
The recruiting industry is chock full of single skill set providers, but what companies really want is a partner who can have a broad impact across all facets of their organization, solving whatever hiring challenges they have. And we’ve done just that, building diverse teams of highly specialized recruiters in the highest demand fields:

𝗧𝗲𝗰𝗵𝗻𝗼𝗹𝗼𝗴𝘆
𝗛𝘂𝗺𝗮𝗻 𝗥𝗲𝘀𝗼𝘂𝗿𝗰𝗲𝘀
𝗗𝗶𝗴𝗶𝘁𝗮𝗹 𝗘𝘅𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲 & 𝗠𝗮𝗿𝗸𝗲𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴,
𝗦𝗮𝗹𝗲𝘀
𝗙𝗶𝗻𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲 & 𝗮𝗰𝗰𝗼𝘂𝗻𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴
𝗥𝗲𝗮𝗹 𝗲𝘀𝘁𝗮𝘁𝗲 𝘀𝗲𝗿𝘃𝗶𝗰𝗲𝘀
𝗔𝗻𝗱 𝘄𝗲’𝗿𝗲 𝗷𝘂𝘀𝘁 𝗴𝗲𝘁𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘁𝗲𝗱...

𝗠𝗮𝗻𝗮𝗴𝗲𝗱 𝗥𝗲𝗰𝗿𝘂𝗶𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗶𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗙𝘂𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲.
Flexibility in creating our custom solutions has been a staple in our approach since our inception. But during our own growth, we also recognized that the traditional fulfillment models for recruiting service are deeply flawed.

Contingent Search is expensive and the two-sided lack of commitment often yields poor results. Recruitment Process Outsourcing suffers from poor fulfillment; flat-rate service means providers have no skin in the game to maximize the end result. And traditional Executive Retained Search is exorbitantly overpriced, tone-deaf to the modern world of freely available data.

recruiter_about:
VSP Now Accepting Applications for Trooper!

The Virginia Department of State Police is recruiting for qualified applicants for the position of State Police Trooper. EARN WHILE YOU LEARN. Qualified candidates accepted to the Training Academy will be paid a salary of $58,232. In addition, candidates will receive benefits including life insurance, health insurance, sick leave, and paid vacation. Twelve months following graduation from the State Police Academy, the annual salary will increase. Upon graduation, candidates are supplied all equipment and uniforms, including a take home car. Candidates are also eligible, with tenure, for promotional and career progression opportunities including the opportunity to serve in many exciting specialty positions across the Commonwealth of Virginia. 

The duties include but are not limited to: enforcing the laws of the Commonwealth of Virginia; investigating criminal and traffic offenses; effecting arrests; communicating effectively both orally and in writing; testifying in court; safely operating a law enforcement vehicle; effectively interviewing individuals; performing lifesaving functions; safely and effectively utilizing firearms; performing effective searches of people and property; and reading and comprehending a variety of legal and administrative documents.
#ChallengeYourselfToMakeADifference #VATrooper #Trooper #VSP

To Apply: www.VATrooper.com

recruiter_about:
Layne joined the Recruiting Agency Industry in 2008, as a Technical Upstream Recruiter, and brings with him over 16 years of sales & leadership experience. Currently he is a Senior Engineering Recruiter & Account Manager with Kelly Services- Engineering. He has consistently proven to be the top producing Recruiter over the last 14 years while in leadership roles for over 7 years, and is a technical expert in the Oil & Gas Industry(Upstream/Midstream/Downstream, Energy, Alternative/Renewable Energy, Oil Field Services, EPC, Various Industrial Engineering & Manufacturing & Mining & Aerospace & Pulp & Paper & Packaging & Specialty Chemicals & Petrochemical & Refinery & Plastics & Construction & Infrastructure & Civil & Structural & MEP Engineering & Engineering Design-Build Firm Industries. He is responsible for helping his company successfully fulfill high level technical and executive level Retained Search roles with our top clients, and he currently has a 100% retained search success fill ratio. Layne is a technical executive search professional, that through his strong relationships with his candidates & clients, helps them achieve their goals. His management style is “Leading by Example”, and is always a positive source for his team to consult with him on any phase in the Recruiting Process. His primary strengths include: Executive Search, training new recruiters, mentoring, improving recruiting processes, leading recruiting efforts on high level technical roles, managing recruiting team, compensation analysis, offer negotiations, attending Client meetings to identify Client’s technical recruiting needs, Business Development, Sales & Account Management. He has been integral in helping all clients fill their most pressing roles on the Upstream & Downstream & Engineering & Construction & Manufacturing side, through his strong network in those Industries, by building lifelong relationships with his candidates and clients. Expertise in various ATS database systems. Some key attributes that describe him are Integrity, Leader, Knowledgeable, Quality, Deliver-ability, Tenacity, Honesty, and Professionalism.

There's no greater reward than making a difference in someone's life and helping them achieve their aspirations. I firmly believe that everyone has a unique and exceptional offering.
